mapper.sql: a.benzibianhao AS "benzibianhao", a.yonghuid AS "yonghuid", a.shenqingren AS "shenqingren", a.shenqingbumen AS "shenqingbumen", a.shenqingriqi AS "shenqingriqi", a.baomibendaxiao AS "baomibendaxiao", a.baomibenguige AS "baomibenguige", a.proc_sno AS "procSno", a.id AS "id", a.form_id AS "formId", a.data_secret_level AS "dataSecretLevel", a.version AS "version", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_by_dept AS "createByDept.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.shenqingrenmiji AS "shenqingrenmiji", a.sqsl AS "sqsl", a.baomibenmiji AS "baomibenmiji", a.shenqingrenid AS "shenqingrenid", a.shenqingbumenid AS "shenqingbumenid", a.baomibenbianhao AS "baomibenbianhao", a.yeshu AS "yeshu"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO efm_mjkzranviu( benzibianhao, yonghuid, shenqingren, shenqingbumen, shenqingriqi, baomibendaxiao, baomibenguige, proc_sno, id, form_id, data_secret_level, version, create_by, create_by_dept, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, shenqingrenmiji, sqsl, baomibenmiji, shenqingrenid, shenqingbumenid, baomibenbianhao, yeshu ) VALUES ( #{benzibianhao}, #{yonghuid}, #{shenqingren}, #{shenqingbumen}, #{shenqingriqi}, #{baomibendaxiao}, #{baomibenguige}, #{procSno}, #{id}, #{formId}, #{dataSecretLevel}, #{version}, #{createBy.id}, #{createByDept.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{shenqingrenmiji}, #{sqsl}, #{baomibenmiji}, #{shenqingrenid}, #{shenqingbumenid}, #{baomibenbianhao}, #{yeshu} )
mapper.update: UPDATE efm_mjkzranviu SET benzibianhao = #{benzibianhao}, yonghuid = #{yonghuid}, shenqingren = #{shenqingren}, shenqingbumen = #{shenqingbumen}, shenqingriqi = #{shenqingriqi}, baomibendaxiao = #{baomibendaxiao}, baomibenguige = #{baomibenguige}, proc_sno = #{procSno}, form_id = #{formId}, data_secret_level = #{dataSecretLevel}, version = #{version}, create_by_dept = #{createByDept.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, shenqingrenmiji = #{shenqingrenmiji}, sqsl = #{sqsl}, baomibenmiji = #{baomibenmiji}, shenqingrenid = #{shenqingrenid}, shenqingbumenid = #{shenqingbumenid}, baomibenbianhao = #{baomibenbianhao}, yeshu = #{yeshu} WHERE id = #{id}
